attributes.action: ensure that group or organisation that want to further the gay sex movement must in their teacchings or literature fully explain what gay sex actually involves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before 'gay sex' is promoted in schools etc the group or organisation must fully explain to their intended audience exactly what the gay [homesexual/lesbain] sex act involves.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
